name: Black Sonata
blurb: Track down the subjects of Shakespeare’s sonatas in London.

name: Chess
blurb: It's chess!

name: Long Live the Queen
blurb: Secretly place and reveal court members to protect the princess.

name: Lawyer Up
blurb: Tactically play argument cards to sway the jury in an asymmetrical trial.

name: Paris: La Cité de la Lumière
blurb: Place oddly shaped buildings to capture the limelight.

name: Inhuman Conditions
blurb: An interrogator tries to determine humanity.

name: Sprawlopolis
blurb: Arrange city blocks, drawn from a small deck, to complete planning goals.

name: Legacy of Dragonholt
blurb: Read through a story full of choices to embark on quests.

name: Warhammer Underworlds
blurb: Battle your miniature warbands using cards in a tactical arena.

name: Skulls of Sedlec
blurb: Arrange the skulls of the Sedlec Ossuary to meet the deceased’s last wishes.

name: Sherlock Holmes: Consulting Detective
blurb: Help Sherlock Holmes solve tricky mysteries.

name: TIME Stories Revolution
blurb: Time travel to protect the space-time continuum.

name: Prêt-à-Porter
blurb: Use ruthless economic strategy to create the dominate fashion house.

name: Fort
blurb: Trade cards to find the best gang of friends, collect the most pizza and toys, and build the coolest fort.

name: Blokus Trigon
blurb: Be the first to place all your complex shapes on the increasingly crowded board.

name: Love Letter
blurb: As a suitor, draw from a small deck of courtiers whose special abilities might get your letter closer to the Princess.

name: Settlers of Catan
blurb: Use randomly distributed resources to build roads and cities and dominate a small island.

name: Pandemic Legacy
blurb: Travel a changing globe to stop the spread of disease.

name: Root
blurb: Each faction in this crowded, colonized forest plays a different asymmetrical game.

name: Fire Tower
blurb: Fight fire, and friends, with fire by strategically playing cards to place or remove flames.

name: Oath
blurb: Shape history in a land of empire and exile with favors, secrets, and the land’s many denizens.

name: Timeline: Diversity
blurb: Correctly place your historical inventions, people, and events on a growing timeline.

name: Mahjong
blurb: James only knows riichi.

name: Witness
blurb: Each detective receives a small picture of a case, and then must quietly pass the key facts to their partners while ignoring red herrings being told to them.

name: Bananagrams
blurb: Create your own crossword as fast as possible.
